summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing an agreement with the United States of America, Department of Labor for a grant to provide employment opportunities with the City and other local government agencies under the authority of Section VI of the Emergency Employment Act of 1971; creating certain positions in the Executive Department Office of Human Resources, Office of Emergency Employment; increasing certain budget accounts authorizing expenditures and contracts in implementation thereof, and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
